 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

org.cs2c.nginlib
接口 AuthInfo

public interface AuthInfo

作者：
Mikes

User use the AuthInfo interface to specify remote host and Authentication information. The info includes host ip, username and password. The method of accessing remote host is ssh2 in default. AuthInfo instance should be set properly for get instance of MiddlewareFactory.

另请参见：
MiddlewareFactory

方法摘要
 void setHost(java.lang.String hostName)
          Set remote host name or ip address.
 void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
          Set remote password for specific user.
 void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
          Set remote host user name.
 

方法详细信息

setHost

void setHost(java.lang.String hostName)
Set remote host name or ip address.

参数：
hostName - remote host name or ip address

setUsername

void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
Set remote host user name.

参数：
username - remote host user name

setPassword

void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
Set remote password for specific user.
